d.f: ￹￺okay * agreed * acceptable￻好，同意，贊成，可接受

e: ￹`O~ `nga'ay~`ay~ `a~ `romi'ad~ `anini~.￺This is a good day (refers to weather or opportunity).￻今天是好日子，今天是好天氣
￹`Ma~`nga'ay~ `kako~ `a~ `tayra~ `haw~? `Ga'ayto~.￺May I go? Fine.￻我可以去嗎?可以
￹`Sa~`nga'ay~ `sa~`~ `ko~ `harateng~ `ako~ `anini~.￺I feel much better (about it) now. (implied that I had been upset)￻今天我很安心,我的心情好多了(煩亂，吵架，發脾氣之後)
￹`O~ `ka~`nga'ay~`an~ `ako~ `konini~.￺This is my opportunity.￻這是我的好機會
￹`O~ `nga'ay~`ay~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `cingra~.￺He is a good man.￻他是好人
